title: Low Grade Lot of 14 T205's w/ Chance & Clarke Sovereign  ***SOLD***

posts.post_title: Low Grade Lot of 14 T205's w/ Chance & Clarke Sovereign  ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
Cards have been sold.


Lot of 14 T205 cards in poor to good condition.  Please see scans for conditions of the individual cards.  Looking for $SOLD for the lot delivered.  The lot of cards includes the following:

Clarke-Sovereign

Chance-Sovereign

Lord-Piedmont

Overall-Sovereign

Schlei-Sovereign

Sharpe-Sweet Caporal

Smith-Polar Bear

Wiltse-Sovereign

Abbaticchio-Piedmont
